duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in meeting the management and administrative needs of the Property Management staff, including lease administration, rent assessments, and tenant ledger assessments.
Coordinate vendors and tenant work orders, filing, organizing, and maintaining office supply inventory.
Correspondence related to AR, CAM Recs, budget letters, mailings, tenant rent notices, and miscellaneous building communications.
Track delinquencies, post rent checks, and maintain tenant ledgers with monthly updates to Property Managers.
Coordinate tenant concerns and work orders appropriately, and provide weekly updates to property owners.
Abstract leases, track renewals and terminations, and prepare New Tenant Welcome Packets and Access Key Cards.
Maintain and update emergency and tenant contact lists, and inventory office supplies, ordering building and office supplies as needed.

skills.skill: Microsoft Suite: Calendar, Outlook, Word, Excel, Teams
Effective written and oral communication skills

education_certification.credential: High school or equivalent (Required) – Bachelors preferred
